entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Richer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
